Package com.example.omninventory

Class ItemImageAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemImageAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.omninventory.ItemImageAdapter
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditableItemImageAdapter
public class ItemImageAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemImageAdapter.ViewHolder>
A custom RecyclerView.Adapter that works with ItemImage objects. Uses item_list_content.xml for layout display of ItemImages in a RecyclerView. Has methods that handle adding, setting, and removing images along with updating the contents of the ArrayAdapter.
